> 
> Thanks for bringing this film to our attention Mary-Ann,
> and as you have correctly assumed, KUNOICHI: DEADLY MIRAGE is NOT a

> 

Yes, that's what I feared and I was being polite saying that it was 
not exactly a masterpiece, in case someone actually enjoyed that 
movie...

A friend of mine had seen that movie in a DVD store and I've been 
wondering if I should go buy it or not. I now know that that movie is 
going to stay right on its shelve.

Happy new year to everyone,
MA
